title: 39.) Top 40 Countdown - My Brother Puts Me Down
description:
Ellie and her brother are competitive and fight a lot, and she and her dad call in to ask Dr. Laura for help. - Dr. Laura: "Your children are mimicking your competitive marriage."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
